name: World's Best Engineer
description:
GAME SUMMARY

Help this tiny engineer fix colleagues' electronic devices by...
entering inside the devices!
Complete each puzzle to win a wardrobe item. All this to impress your office crush!

Worth it!

This tiny game starring our tiny engineer was made for bug fall jam 2021.
Development: Denizhan Can
Art & Animation & Design: Lama Albayomi
Art & UI & Design: İlayda Güç
Art & Design & Honorary PM: Gökçe Mutlu
